svg.text: Moderate Content Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Moderate Content
Actor(s):
System (ML-powered with Toxic-Bert)
Description:
Automated ML-powered content screening system using Toxic-Bert with 87% auto-approval
rate, providing real-time content analysis and manual review queue management.
Preconditions:
1. Content must be submitted for moderation (match creation, profile updates)
2. ML moderation system must be operational and accessible
Main Flow:
1. System receives content for moderation (match titles, descriptions, profiles)
2. System preprocesses content for ML analysis (text cleaning, formatting)
3. System applies Toxic-Bert model for toxicity and appropriateness analysis
4. System calculates confidence scores for content safety assessment
5. High confidence safe content (87% of cases) receives automatic approval
6. Auto-approved content is immediately published and visible to users
7. Medium/low confidence content is queued for manual admin review
8. System flags specific concerns: toxicity, inappropriate language, spam patterns
9. System logs moderation decisions for performance tracking and improvement
10. System maintains moderation statistics and accuracy metrics
11. System provides feedback loop for model improvement and calibration
12. System handles edge cases and escalates complex content appropriately
Alternative Flows:
A1. High-risk content: System immediately flags for urgent admin review
A2. ML system unavailable: System defaults to manual review queue
A3. False positive: Admin feedback improves model accuracy over time
A4. Batch processing: System handles multiple content items efficiently
A5. Appeal process: Users can request review of moderation decisions
